title: Episode 715 - Special Guest NHL Legend Sean Avery
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest NHL badass Sean Avery to discuss starring in the Christopher Nolan movie "Tenet", his hatred for NYC and their politicians, why he would love to fight random people in the streets and what it's like t...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest NHL badass Sean Avery to discuss starring in the Christopher Nolan movie "Tenet", his hatred for NYC and their politicians, why he would love to fight random people in the streets and what it's like to break a man, why his teeth are whiter than Joe Biden's, and why he has to trim his pubes twice a month. This is one of our favorite shows ever.
